to run the VSCode debugger on unit tests what would I do?

elements.text: to run the VSCode debugger on unit tests what would I do?

text: I'll send you another launch.json config in just a min

elements.text: I'll send you another launch.json config in just a min

text:
```{
            "name": "unittest",
            "type": "python",
            "request": "launch",
            "program": "${workspaceFolder}/koku/manage.py",
            "args": [
                "test",
                "--noinput",
                "-v 2",
                "masu.test.processor.azure.test_azure_report_processor.AzureReportProcessorTest.test_azure_process_duplicates",
            ],
            "django": true,
            "pythonPath": "/Users/mskarbek/.local/share/virtualenvs/koku-shq9YH-f/bin/python"
        }```
change this line to be the test you want to run

elements.text: change this line to be the test you want to run

text: `"masu.test.processor.azure.test_azure_report_processor.AzureReportProcessorTest.test_azure_process_duplicates",`
of course, update your `pythonPath` and add the `envFile` param
and when you go to launch the debugger, be sure to select `unittest` from the drop down, then hit start

elements.text: and when you go to launch the debugger, be sure to select
from the drop down, then hit start
